Articles.Content: i got ksp 0.90 some time ago and now 1.0 is out; how do i download it?
just click to purchase it and at the top you will be able to log in and just click download! happy crashings!

[https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/)

Sign in>My Account

Click Download next to KSP>Choose your OS
i don't have anything to log in with; i got it off steam early access and idk if i signed up on the site. there's nothing associated with my email there.
if you got it off steam then steam will update it.

If you got it from steam, them just log into steam and it will update

Edit: Ninja'ed
just a tip: backup your 0.90 install. just in case...

i don't know how to backup

oh well

yaaay

> 
> i don't know how to backup
> oh well
> 
> yaaay

copy and paste your .90 KSP from the steam directory to anywhere else on your computer o.o

To back up on steam, go to your library, right click on KSP in the list on the left, click "properties" and somewhere in there is a "browse local files". This opens the actual game folder in a file browser window, which can be copied to a location of your choice.
